title: Why can't I make a new image folder?
content: Why can't I make new image folders? Also my twitter folder disappeared and when I save images from twitter now I don't know where they go. Also when I want to attach an image to a tweet or a text, the screenshot folder doesn't show up for me to choose from. I have to go into images, select screenshots, move the selected screen shot into my download folder, and then I can post it (which is what I did here) so whats up? and i just missing something?
